ygData.subject: RE: Any tips.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, Brave Heart Madagan. I m 28 days old and only 21st level.  The problem is, leveling generally is boring.  I get bored trying to stay in one place for
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, Brave Heart Madagan.

I'm 28 days old and only 21st level. The problem is, leveling generally is
boring. I get bored trying to stay in one place for long, much less at one
camp. Whenever I see that someone stayed in the Highkeep basement for 3
levels or is Cazic for 5 levels, I get that sick feeling in the pit of my
stomach. If that's what it takes to level beyond 25 I never will. Doing
those things is not fun for me in the least, and if the game isn't fun I
won't play, pure and simple.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 9:30 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Any tips.....


Ok, I love Everquest and have done ever since I started playing 7-8 months
ago. My problem is, I'm crap at levelling, to give you an idea I think I'm
31 days old and level 32. Thats almost 24 hours per level *sighs*

There are lots of level you level 40+'ers on this list so I was wondering,
how can I get a steady gain in experience? And the answer, "don't die as
much", doesn't really help. I wish I could die less than I do but I'm just
unlucky I guess. It's not my equipment that sucks just the rate I level at.
I have good equipment for my level, Full Lambent, Various magic items
Dwb's, Exe Hood etc and plat jewellery. Plus I have about 1.5-2k in cash in
the bank.

I was quite pleased last night with the 2 bubs exp however I did play for
about 7-8 hours so thats crap in comparison, I have tried places like
Highkeep and it just gets dull and boring. Sol A is usually good but I
still get killed there sometimes and I end up with next to no exp made.

Any info and advice would be greatly appreciated.....

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 32 Songs - Veeshan
